description: The ARN of the media pipeline that you want to tag. Consists of the pipeline's endpoint region, resource ID, and pipeline ID.

parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: The ARN of the media pipeline associated with any tags. The ARN consists of the pipeline's endpoint region, resource ID, and pipeline ID.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags associated with the specified media pipeline. (dict) --- A key/value pair that grants users access to meeting resources. The key half of a tag. The value half of a tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key half of a tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value half of a tag.
